meanings.definition: Whites: the color or hue of milk or fresh snow
meanings.sent1: The whites of the snow glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress in shades of whites and blues.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur was as white as the whites of an egg!
meanings.sent4: The artist used different shades of whites to create a stunning winter landscape.
meanings.sent5: The whites of the clouds contrasted beautifully against the blue sky.

meanings.definition: Whites: the white part of an egg
meanings.sent1: She separated the whites from the yolks carefully.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two egg whites.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the whites all over the counter!
meanings.sent4: The fluffy whites of the eggs made the cake light and airy.
meanings.sent5: The whites were whipped into a frothy foam for the meringue.

meanings.definition: Whites: people of European descent, especially those of northern European ancestry
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood was predominantly populated by whites.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her heritage as a white person.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone dressed up as whites from history.
meanings.sent4: The meeting room was filled with whites discussing important issues.
meanings.sent5: The history book focused on the contributions of whites to society.
